title: The living is easy at The Lodge Apartments! Comfortable 1 bed/1 bath!
posting_body: ['The Lodge Apartments', 'Located at: 17500 25th Ave NE Marysville, WA 98271', 'Featured unit: 1 - 3 bed | 1 - 2 bath | 557 - 1370 sq ft', 'Prices start at: Please call', 'Call Today!', 'show contact info', 'Currently fully leased.', 'Accepting inquiries for future available units.', 'The Lodge is conveniently located at the Smokey Point exit off Interstate 5, nestled in the heart of a burgeoning community.', 'The Lodge is tucked away enough to feel remote and private, yet features easy access to all major roadways - truly the perfect location to call "home."', 'Wonderful Amenities!', '− Basketball Court', '− BBQ/Picnic Area', '− Billiards', '− Clubhouse', '− Coffee bar', '− Courtyard', '− Dog Park', '− Fitness center (2)', '− Outdoor pool (2)', '− Playground (2)', '− Covered outdoor patio with fireplace and BBQ', '− Off Street Parking', '− Onsite management services', '− Open 1, 2 & 3 bedroom apartment homes', '− Pet friendly community, with pet stations', '− Planned Social Activities', '− Reserved covered parking available', '− Resident Lounge', '− Unattached garages', '− Walking distance to abundant shopping and dining', 'Apartment Features!', '− ADA Accessible', '− Carpet', '− Dishwasher', '− Disposal', '− Oversized windows', '− Range', '− Refrigerator', '− Vinyl Flooring', '− Washer/dryer', '− Wheelchair Access in Select Homes', 'show contact info', 'Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Terms:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'We love your furry friends!', 'Two pets per apartment home accepted', '$500 refundable deposit', 'One time pet fee of $300 ($50 for additional pet)', '$30 pet rent per pet', 'Breed restrictions apply', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY']
